com.opencsv

Class CSVParserBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencsv.CSVParserBuilder

  • public class CSVParserBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for creating a CSVParser. final CSVParser parser = new CSVParserBuilder() .withSeparator('\t') .withIgnoreQuotations(true) .build();
    See Also:
    CSVParser

      CSVParserBuilder withEscapeChar(char escapeChar)
      Sets the character to use for escaping a separator or quote.
      CSVParserBuilder withIgnoreLeadingWhiteSpace(boolean ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace)
      Sets the ignore leading whitespace setting - if true, white space in front of a quote in a field is ignored.
      CSVParserBuilder withIgnoreQuotations(boolean ignoreQuotations)
      Sets the ignore quotations mode - if true, quotations are ignored.
      CSVParserBuilder withQuoteChar(char quoteChar)
      Sets the character to use for quoted elements.
      CSVParserBuilder withSeparator(char separator)
      Sets the delimiter to use for separating entries.
      CSVParserBuilder withStrictQuotes(boolean strictQuotes)
      Sets the strict quotes setting - if true, characters outside the quotes are ignored.
